Translations.Text: neohuiga seolo dobji moshaneun geos eun eojjidoen il-inyo
geuleohji moshanila geunal geudeul eun simpan-e bogjonghage doenani
geudeul-eun seolo dagaseomyeo seolo ga seolo-ege jilmunhadeola
sillo neohuiga oleunpyeon-eulo bu teo uliege wass-eumyeo lago malhani
anila neohui seuseuloga mid-eum i eobs-eossnola
ulineun neohuileul daseulil amu leon himdo eobsdoda geugeos-eun ohilyeo neohuiga omanhan baegseongjung-e iss-eossnola
jinliin junim-ui malsseum-i ibjeung doeeoss-euni ije ulineun uli joee daehan beol-eul bad-aya hal ppun-ila
sillo ulineun neohuileul banghwangke haess-eumyeo uli seuseulodo banghwanghaessnola
sillo geudeul moduneun geunal beol-eulbad-eum-e hamkke halila
hananim-eun ileohdeus joejieun ja leul daseulini
hananim oee sin-i eobsdaneun malsseum-i geudeul-ege iss-eoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun omanhagon hayeoss-eumyeo
jejeongsin-i anin siin-eul wiha yeo uliui sindeul-eul pogihaeya doeneu nyo lago geudeul-eun malhaessdeola
geuleohji anhnola geuneun jinlilo dolaehayeo seonjijadeul-eul hwagjeunghayeossnola
sillo neohuineun gotongseuleoun beol eul masbol geos-iyo
neohuiga haenghan geos-eulo daegaleul bad-eulila
geuleona seongsilhan hananim-ui jong deul-eun je-uiimyeo
geudeul-eul wihaeseoneun allyeojin il yonghal yangsig-i iss-euni
gippeum-ui gwaildeulgwa myeong-yewa jon eom-i geugeos-ila
geudeul-eun gajang chugbogbad-eun cheongug eseo
uija-e anj-a seolo majubogo anj-aseo
heuleuneun saemmul-eseo jan-eulo sunbaeleul deulge doenani
geugeos-eun sujeong-gat-i hayahgo ma sineun ideul-ege mas-i issdeola
geugeos-eun meoliga apeuji ani hago chwihajido anhdeola
geudeul juwieneun sungyeolhan yeoseong deul-i issnani geunyeoui nun-eun jal boho doeeossgo nun-eun keugo aleumdaumae
machi jal bohobad-eun dalgyalgwa gat deola
geudeul-eun seolo majubomyeo seolo ga jilmun-eul hani
geu jung-e han salam-i mal-eul si jaghadeola hyeonseeseo jeoege han chin guga iss-eossneunde
